titles.title: A resolution designating December 12, 2009, as "Wreaths Across America Day".
A resolution designating December 12, 2009, as "Wreaths Across America Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Designates December 12, 2009, as Wreaths Across America Day.
Honors the Wreaths Across America project, the Patriot Guard Riders, and all of the volunteers and donors involved in this worthy tradition of placing holiday wreaths at national cemeteries and veterans' memorials.
Recognizes the sacrifices our veterans, servicemembers, and their families have made, and continue to make, for our nation.
